text: Quest For Fire () is a 1981 Canadian French adventure movie directed by Jean- Jacques Annaud and starring Ron Perlman, Everett McGill, Rae Down Chong, Nameer El-Kadi. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and won an Academy Award in 1983. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 adventure movies Category:1980s epic movies Category:Canadian adventure movies Category:French adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Jean-Jacques Annaud Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Africa
title: Quest For Fire
